description_en: This MiniDV Camcorder is lightweight, but packs in all the advanced features you need. It offers higher resolution, wider color bandwidth, and lower noise than virtually any other analog format camcorder. Using three advanced HAD CCDs combined with advanced design technologies, the DCR-VX2000 provides stunning performance of up to 530 horizontal lines of resolution. 1/4 to 1/10, 000 shutter speeds (AE mode) allows you to customize shutter speed settings for almost any environment to ensure the best possible picture or to achieve a desired effect. And 16: 9 widescreen recording lets you record in a true widescreen or anamorphic aspect ratio for cinema-like results.     Sony DCR-VX2000 Pro Package includes the following items: Sony DCR-VX2000 Digital Camcorder, Sony LCH-VX2000 System Case, Sony NPF-960 long life battery, 5 Sony DVM60ME 60 Minute Digital Video Tapes and JVC HR-DVS1 Mini DV/S-VHS Dual Deck. It features Mini DV Format and High Resolution Super VHS and VHS, Super VHS ET Recording, DigiPure Technology with TBC and 4MB Frame Memory, PCM Digital Audio (DV) and Hi-Fi VHS Stereo with MTS Decoder, VCR Plus+ with "Cable Eye" Cable Box Controller, Jog/Shuttle on Remote, Insert Editing with Flying Erase Head, Audio Dubbing, Auto Index and Index Search, Digital AV Tracking, Auto SP-EP Timer Recording, Active Video Calibration, Multi-Brand TV/DBS Compatible Remote with Jog / Shuttle, Express Programming, S-video Input on Front / Back Panel, Two S-Video Output on Back Panel, Rear AV INPUTs, Gold Plated Front Inputs, DV Playback Component Video Output, Two A/V Outputs, 181 Channel Tuner, 1Year /12 Event Timer (6 event each for DV and S-VHS/VHS), Multi Lingual Color on Screen Men.

description_en: Enjoy remarkable 24x zoom magnification in a camera that fits comfortably and securely in one hand. With optical zoom, it captures both moving and still pictures with exquisite beauty. It's great for taking photos of indoor parties or vast landscapes.    The joystick makes the camera much easier to use, letting you control all basic operations with one hand. As you shoot, just watch the image in the monitor and follow the instruction guide. You can handle a number of operations quickly and easily, without even taking your eye off the subject.    USB 2.0 compatibility gives you high-speed uploading of DV data to a PC over a single USB cable. Video Class compatibility allows real-time transfer of DV moving picture data over the same USB cable. The included MotionDV STUDIO 5.3 LE application makes it easy to edit DV footage, so you can create your own polished, professional-looking movies for keepsakes.    The Pure Color Engine LSI converts the CCD output signal from a complementary color signal into RGB signal (containing the three primary colors in light) at an early stage and extracts the low-frequency luminance component from the RGB signal. The luminance signal is then generated in the same way as in TV broadcasting. Advanced 3D Frame Noise Reduction also gives you better results when shooting with low illumination because it improves color noise-reduction performance by 30% compared with conventional systems. This innovative LSI achieves truly superb color reproduction.

description_en: From summer escapes to winter wonderlands, life is meant to be savored. That's why Canon created the Optura 500 digital camcorder. Enjoy the convenience of holding a digital video camcorder and digital camera all in one hand. Low and compact, the Optura 500 camcorder features a swivel grip and palm pad... perfect comfort when shooting long days at sporting events or marathon birthday parties. For those desiring stunning videos and photos, supreme ease-of-use and powerful versatility, Canon's Optura 500 camcorder has it all.    Incorporating Canon's latest digital technologies, the Optura 500 digital camcorder comes complete with features normally reserved for higher-end professional camcorders and cameras. Shoot, watch, print and share your favorite memories in vivid clarity and stunning color. Best of all, the Optura camcorders are easy to use, allowing you to enjoy every second of every moment.
description_fr: Captez les moments spéciaux de la vie dans la paume de la main avec le caméscope miniDV Optura 500. Disposant d'éléments optiques professionnels renommés Canon, d'un DCC de 2, 2 mégapixels avec filtre de couleurs primaires RVB et de la technologie DIGIC DV exclusive à Canon, l'Optura 500 produit des séquences vidéo et des photos aux couleurs naturelles d'une clarté éclatante. L'objectif zoom optique 10x comprend un système de densité neutre innovateur qui donne une qualité supérieure dans une vaste gamme de conditions d'éclairage. Afin d'accroître les possibilités, l'Optura 500 est doté d'une fente intégrée pour carte mémoire SD ou MultiMedia. Le transfert de fichiers vers un ordinateur se fait rapidement et l'envoi de vidéo numérique a été rendu possible avec l'ajout de ports haute vitesse USB 2.0 et IEEE1394. L'Optura 500 a un bouton Print/Share; il est compatible avec la norme PictBridge et offre en plus la fonction d'impression avec les imprimantes directes et Bubble Jet directes de Canon pour que vous disposiez d'une gamme d'options d'impression sans ordinateur au toucher d'un bouton. Parmi ses autres caractéristiques, on trouve le mode 16: 9 pour l'enregistrement de séquences vidéo haute résolution pour téléviseurs à écran large, le format MPEG-4, le mode Super nuit, une nouvelle minitorche vidéo quatre fois plus brillante que les DEL blanches traditionnelles ainsi qu'un adaptateur Macro Ring Lite qui permet même de faire, la nuit, des plans rapprochés sans ombre.

description_en: The PV-DV400 delivers high resolution digital video that is so sharp, it must be seen to be believed. But that is just the beginning. It also features an 18X optical zoom lens, digital effects, i.LINK and serial interfaces, 3-inch color LCD monitor and color viewfinder, removable 8MB MultiMedia card, and an IR filter that allow recording in near total darkness. Mini DV is the revolutionary digital video format that takes home video recording to new, previously unimaginable levels. Almost 500 lines of horizontal resolution combined with CD-quality audio on a miniature cassette that is 56% smaller than a 8mm tape. And, when using an 80-minute tape in LP mode, the PV-DV400 can record up to two full hours of video.    The 3" high-resolution view screen flips out and rotates 270 degrees for great versatility. Tilt it down for high angle overhead shooting in crowds, tilt it up for low-angle shots or tilt it forward for self-portraits. With the built-in speaker, you can play back and watch your entire recording instantly. With 110, 000 Pixels, you'll always get a great image. Color Viewfinder allows you to see what you're recording in full vivid color. 18x Hi-Definition Zoom is a powerful optical zoom that acts like a telescope to get you closer to the action. It's great for close-ups, too. Also, it operates at seven different zoom speeds, so you can go from wide angle to full telephoto in 2 to 22 seconds; a great feature for your cinematic flexibility. Panasonic uses DEIS (Digital Electronic Image Stabilization) to compensate for unintentional hand and camcorder movement to help stabilize recordings, even if you're recording in a moving vehicle or a crowded room. PhotoShot Integrated Digital Still Camera allows you to use the digital camcorder as a digital still camera. You can record up to 750 still images on one 60-minute MiniDV tape in LP mode, and then transfer them to your computer via the IEEE 1394 interface. Great for use in e-mail or printed documents, play them back on a TV for a personal Slide show, or print them as photos on a compatible printer. It can even make simulate a shutter sound like a traditional motor drive camera. Built-in Monitor Speaker allows you to listen to your video on playback. External Input Recording allows you to input video programs from external sources, for employing your camcorder as an auxiliary recorder, or editing audio or video programs. PCM Digital Stereo Recording and Playback provides wider range and better clarity in recording. Automatic Exposure Shutter Speed Control automatically adjusts the shutter speed according to light conditions. Backlight Compensation/ Gain Up reduces the chances of "silhouettes" in your videos by adjusting to backlighting conditions automatically. Bookmark Search probes the blank portions of your tape to find the end of your last recording, even after you have ejected your tape and reinserted it at a later date. SP/LP Tape Speeds provides flexibility in recording choices. SP has normal recording times without a loss of audio or video quality.

description_en: SCW62 is a Samsung's Hi8 camcorder with 2.5" Color LCD. The introduction of Easy-Q / Custom-Q features enhances its user-friendly operation. Easy-Q guarantees a standard shot for user in any condition. For Easy Mode, you can just press Easy-Q button and everything is OK. Custom-Q makes it possible to possess favorite mode for professional user in any condition. You press Custom-Q Button and your favorite mode setting is OK!     There is also PAL signal AV output. It is possible to display PAL television system even with a NTSC camcorder. It means that you can enjoy your recorded image with every television in the world. The PIP screen displays original picture while using optical & digital zoom. It helps you recognize what is the subject of the digital zoom. The Program AE is an easy way to select the recording mode according to the scene being filmed. In each of the 6 modes, Samsung camcorder selects the best combination of shutter speed and aperture for the best results.

Les gammes de produits Samsung reflètent l'innovation technologique de la marque depuis son origine.

With the Sony CCD-TRV128 Hi8 Handycam camcorder, you get most of the high-end features you would expect from a top-of-the-line camcorder, such as a 2.5" SwivelScreen LCD display, a huge 20X optical zoom and NightShot Plus infrared recording system, all for an unbelievably low price. It even includes the new Easy Handycam feature, which automates most of the camcorder's processes and makes videotaping a snap.

description_en: Sony DCR-PC110 digital Handycam camcorder offers higher resolution, more hours of recording and more professional features than any analog camcorder. The digital technology delivers a richer and more accurate picture quality than the analog format. Featuring a 1/4" Advanced HAD CCD with 1,070,000 pixels, the camcorder provides stunning detail and clarity, with exceptional video and still image performance. Carl Zeiss professional quality precision lens uses a unique lens coating that reduces glare and flaring, while providing improvement in detail and contrast. Rechargeable Lithium Ion battery means no "memory effect" like other battery types can experience. DCR-PC110 features MPEG movie mode, and Pulse Code Modulation (PCM) stereo audio recording for an incredible 96db dynamic range. It is a sure declaration that Sony is moving forward in the integration of DV and digital stills cameras.
description_fr: Sony est aujourd'hui leader mondial dans les domaines de l'électronique de divertissement et des techniques de communication professionnelles. Tous les produits Sony se ressemblent en un point: ils sont fabriqués, stylisés et testés selon les mêmes normes de qualité rigoureuses.     Véritables bijoux de technologie, les caméscopes numériques de la série PC (format vertical) sauront se faire oublier tout en donnant une image parfaite. Ils vous accompagneront partout et vous permettront de filmer en toute discrétion.

description_en: The Sony DCR-PC110 Digital Handycam Camcorder offers high resolution and lots of professional features. Featuring a 1/4" CCD with 1,070,000 pixels, it provides stunning detail and clarity, with exceptional video and still image performance. Carl Zeiss lens provides the professional performance you need. Rechargeable Lithium Ion battery means no "memory effect" like other battery types can experience. It also has a pop-up flash and MPEG clip mode.    The dual function of the DCR-PC110 brings new ways of enjoyment to customers. It allows them to record high quality digital video on a mini DV tape; besides, customers can use the MPEG movie function and JPEG function to shoot short movie clips up to 42 minutes 40 seconds or Mega-pixel still images respectively. With the MPEG movie function, users can record the MPEG movie clip directly on a Memory Stick in Video mail mode (160 x 112) or Presentation mode (320 x 240), or transfer a recorded video from the DVD or VCR and save it in the MPEG movie format on a Memory Stick. Progressive Shutter System, from the combination of interlace scan CCD and mechanical shutter functions, allows for high-quality still images with very little blurring. Customers can produce creative digital overlaps or blue-screen effects on images by choosing the Memory Chroma Key, Memory Luminance Key or Camera Chroma Key.
description_fr: Sony est aujourd'hui leader mondial dans les domaines de l'électronique de divertissement et des techniques de communication professionnelles. Tous les produits Sony se ressemblent en un point: ils sont fabriqués, stylisés et testés selon les mêmes normes de qualité rigoureuses.     Véritables bijoux de technologie, les caméscopes numériques de la série PC (format vertical) sauront se faire oublier tout en donnant une image parfaite. Ils vous accompagneront partout et vous permettront de filmer en toute discrétion.

description_en: The Canon XL2 allows you to capture images closer to the finished product than ever before. Work that previously was limited to post-production can be simply and effectively accomplished in the field, in the camcorder.    An Open Architecture philosophy, performance found only in much more expensive video cameras, Total Image Control and the solid foundation of Genuine Canon Optics, interchangeable lens capability and superb Canon image processing quality are united in the XL2.    The XL2 brings a host of performance and convenience features to this class of video camcorder- benefits that can't be found in this combination on other high-end video cameras. They include: Canon Super Range Optical Image Stabilization in the standard lens; dual aspect ratios; various frame rate capabilities; image gamma and detail controls; skin detail control and convertible LCD display and among others.    Unprecedented image control coordination between two XL2 cameras, remote computer camera control and direct video recording to computer are just a part of the capabilities of the XL2. Never before has so much creative power been put in the hands of the film maker, video artist, and corporate and event videographer.
description_fr: Canon, leader en technologie photographique et traitement de l'image, offre son caméscope numérique professionnel XL2 à objectif interchangeable. Doté de trois capteurs CCD "progressive scan" de 800 000 pixels et d'une fonction d'enregistrement en 16: 9, la série professionnelle XL2 remplace l'un des produits les plus populaires et emblématiques de l'histoire de Canon - le XL1s, - se posant en nouveau fleuron de l'entreprise dans le secteur des caméscopes numériques.

description_en: Just Keep on Shooting! Nothing to load, nothing to eject, nothing to finalize. Everio is designed to eliminate your worries. Just keep on shooting, because the built-in large capacity hard drive easily stores hours and hours of your video inside a lightweight compact camcorder. Plus shoot thousands of digital still images. So whether you're at home or on the go, you'll always be ready to record or playback your memories.    PRODUCT FEATURES:    Up to 37 Hours of Recording with 30GB Internal Hard Disk Drive;  7 Hours of High-Quality MPEG-2 Video Recording (Average 8.5Mbps, 720x480/60i in ULTRA mode) with Dolby Digital Audio (MOD file);  32x Optical Zoom / 800x Digital Zoom;  2.7" 16: 9 Widescreen Clear LCD Monitor;  16: 9 Wide Mode.
description_fr: Continuez simplement à filmer. Un disque dur à grande capacité intégré permet de stocker facilement des heures et des heures de vidéo et des milliers d'images fixes numériques à l'intérieur d'un caméscope compact et léger. Donc, que vous soyez à la maison ou que vous vous déplaciez, vous serez toujours prêt à enregistrer ou faire jouer vos souvenirs.

The SC-DC164 DVD Camcorder offers the world's strongest zoom - 33x optical/1200x digital - with images clearly displayed on the 2.7" LCD. Turn it on and start shooting in less than 10 seconds. The dual-layer DVD feature doubles the amount of recording time, while a 4-in-1 multi memory card slot lets you store MPEG4 videos and stills. There's even a handy remote control so you can set up the shots - and then get into the action yourself!

description_en: Panasonic Palmcorder Camcorders are easier than ever to operate. They come with a VHS PlayPak, so you can play your home videos in any of the 90 million VCRs nationwide. The PV-D301 also comes with an optical zoom that magnifies images up to 18x by mechanically increasing the focal length of the lens. This feature acts like a telescope, so you won't miss a single detail. You can zoom in for close-ups or zoom out for wide-angle shots, at any of 4 different zoom speeds. All VHS-C Palmcorder Camcorders are equipped with a built-in color enhancement light. Since this light operates when brightness conditions call for it, there's no need to mount an additional accessory flash.

description_en: A 1.33-megapixel GR-D650 features a built-in 1.3X tele-conversion lens and JVC's Low Light Plus - combining an F1.2 lens with JVC's 3D noise reduction that reduces visible video noise by approximately 30 percent and delivers superior low light performance.

description_en: If you're looking to take the plunge into the camcorder market, the Canon ES75 Hi8 camcorder is the perfect reason to dive right in. The ES75 comes packed with a top-quality Canon lens that magnifies your creative possibilities. Its powerful optical zoom range covers everything from sweeping panoramas to action-grabbing telephoto shots. The high-quality digital zoom increases the magnification to 800x for even more dramatic results.    The ES75 offers point-and-shoot simplicity. It incorporates Canon's innovative automatic focusing and exposure to assure you crisp, sharp videos in any lighting condition.

description_en: The Canon ES7000V is a Hi8 Video Camcorder that goes to any length to capture images with digital precision and clarity never before possible. That's because the ES7000V features an Optical 16X zooms lens equipped with high-quality digital zoom capabilities that magnifies zoom power to 72X. To reach even further, Canon's new Extra Long Digital Zoom magnifies to 160X, making you feel like you can actually touch the clouds as you shoot them. And whether you're shooting detailed close-ups or panoramic wide shots, the images you'll record are smooth and steady as Canon's Image Stabilizer corrects camera shake instantly. A large, 3.5" color LCD view screen makes it easy to shoot and play back colorful, well composed videos.     The ES7000V makes taking great videos incredibly easy. Its automatic exposure, shutter speed and white balance capabilities take all the guesswork out of recording. Just turn it on and you're ready to shoot. Add preset titles or create your own, and a wide variety of digital effects and fade modes give a professional touch to your recordings. The ES7000V's Hi8 video and stereo Hi-fi sound deliver maximum image quality and audio fidelity. And furthermore, PAL TV Playback allows the ES7000V to convert NTSC recorded tape signals to PAL signals, a video standard used in some countries.
